items.title: Tomorrow: TechCrunch All Stage launches in Boston — and ticket prices rise
items.description: TechCrunch All Stage officially kicks off tomorrow at 7:30 a.m. ET at SoWa Power Station in Boston — and that’s when ticket prices jump to full rate. ...

items.title: Elmo’s X account hacked to publish racist and antisemetic posts
items.description: A hacker compromised Elmo's X account on Sunday and published abusive posts.

items.title: Discord’s virtual reward, ‘Orbs,’ launches out of beta
items.description: According to Discord, Orbs have been popular among testers, with millions earned and spent during the seven-week beta period.

items.title: Jack Dorsey’s latest app tracks sun exposure
items.description: Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey's new app, called Sun Day, ostensibly helps users track UV exposure and Vitamin D intake.
